categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Rouggle was a member of the Jedi Order during the last century of the Galactic Republic. A Force-sensitive, Rouggle trained as a Jedi and reached the rank of Padawan, but did not pass the Trials of Knighthood. When taking the Trial of Skill—a test of a prospective Jedi Knight's ability to retain self-discipline while distracted—floor tiles were shifted under Rouggle's feet during a lightsaber challenge, causing the Padawan to fail. Rouggle's friend, Thame Cerulian, commented on the particular version of the Trial of Skill in his copy of The Jedi Path: A Manual for Students of the Force, believing Rouggle's failure to have been unfair.
Rouggle was first mentioned in The Jedi Path: A Manual for Students of the Force, a 2010 reference book written by Daniel Wallace. Neither Rouggle's species nor gender were specified in the book.
